amendment.description: To provide for the independence of Inspectors General of certain designated Federal entities, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4072 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 75 - 21. Record Vote Number: 157.

action.text: Amendment SA 4072 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 3739. (consideration: CR S3881-3884, S3894-3895; text: CR S3881-3882) To provide for the independence of Inspectors General of certain designated Federal entities, and for other purposes.
